DECLARE @DataPur NVARCHAR(10); DECLARE @BaseFormID BIGINT; DECLARE @DftDept NVARCHAR(20); SELECT TOP 1 @BaseFormID = TransType FROM T_OCRD WHERE CardType = 'S'; SELECT @DataPur = [dbo].[UF_DataPurview](${UserSign}, @BaseFormID);/*判断权限*/ SELECT @DftDept = DftDept FROM T_OUSI WHERE UserSign = ${UserSign}; /*获取当前用户默认部门*/ SELECT T0.CardCode, T0.CardName FROM T_OCRD T0 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DeptCode FROM T_OUDL WHERE UserSign = ${UserSign} ) T1 ON T0.DeptCode = T1.DeptCode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COL AS DeptCode FROM UF_SPLIT((SELECT ReadCus FROM U_PUR1 WHERE OwnerCode = ${UserSign}), ',') ) T2 ON T0.DeptCode = T2.DeptCode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COL AS DeptCode FROM UF_SPLIT((SELECT ReadCus1 FROM U_PUR1 WHERE OwnerCode = ${UserSign}), ',') ) T3 ON T0.DeptCode = T3.DeptCode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT Col AS GroupCode1 FROM UF_SPLIT((SELECT ReadGroupCode FROM U_PUR1 WHERE OwnerCode = ${UserSign}), ',') ) T4 ON T0.GroupCode = T4.GroupCode1
AND T0.CardName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{CardName}, '%')
AND T0.CardType = 'S' AND T0.U_DocStatus != 'C' /*非锁定状态*/ AND ISNULL(T0.U_BlackList, 'N') = 'N' /*非黑名单*/ AND ( @DataPur = 'ALL' /*看所有*/ OR T0.OwnerCode = ${UserSign} /*采购员本人*/ OR ISNULL(T2.DeptCode, '') != '' /*可看其他部门的所有供应商 如：海外一组的成员，可以看整个海外组+现货组的所有供应商*/ OR (ISNULL(T3.DeptCode, '') != '' AND ISNULL(T4.GroupCode1, 0) > 0) /*可看其他部门的部分供应商，如海外一组的成员，仅可以看如大中华组的贸易商、库存分销商*/ OR (@DataPur = 'Dept' AND ISNULL(T1.DeptCode, '') != '') /*可看本部分*/ )

DECLARE @DataPur NVARCHAR(10); DECLARE @BaseFormID BIGINT; DECLARE @DftDept NVARCHAR(20); SELECT TOP 1 @BaseFormID = TransType FROM T_OCRD WHERE CardType = 'S'; SELECT @DataPur = [dbo].[UF_DataPurview](${UserSign}, @BaseFormID);/*判断权限*/ SELECT @DftDept = DftDept FROM T_OUSI WHERE UserSign = ${UserSign}; /*获取当前用户默认部门*/ SELECT T0.*, T5.DoMain, T6.Name AS 'U_GroupName', T7.DomainName AS 'U_DomainName', T8.Level AS 'U_CusLevel', (T0.Currency + '+' + T0.VatGroup + '+' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, CAST(T9.Rate AS FLOAT))) AS 'CurVat', T9.Rate AS 'VatRate' FROM T_OCRD T0 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DeptCode FROM T_OUDL WHERE UserSign = ${UserSign} ) T1 ON T0.DeptCode = T1.DeptCode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COL AS DeptCode FROM UF_SPLIT((SELECT ReadCus FROM U_PUR1 WHERE OwnerCode = ${UserSign}), ',') ) T2 ON T0.DeptCode = T2.DeptCode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COL AS DeptCode FROM UF_SPLIT((SELECT ReadCus1 FROM U_PUR1 WHERE OwnerCode = ${UserSign}), ',') ) T3 ON T0.DeptCode = T3.DeptCode LEFT JOIN ( SELECT Col AS GroupCode1 FROM UF_SPLIT((SELECT ReadGroupCode FROM U_PUR1 WHERE OwnerCode = ${UserSign}), ',') ) T4 ON T0.GroupCode = T4.GroupCode1 LEFT JOIN U_OADD T5 ON T0.U_Region = T5.KeyCode /*客户地区*/ LEFT JOIN T_OCRG T6 ON T0.GroupCode = T6.Code /*客户性质*/ LEFT JOIN U_OFIE T7 ON T0.U_Industries = T7.KeyCode /*客户行业领域*/ LEFT JOIN U_OHDJ T8 ON T0.U_Level = T8.Code /*客户等级*/ LEFT JOIN T_OVTG T9 ON T0.VatGroup = T9.Code /*税率*/ WHERE T0.CardType = 'S' AND T0.U_DocStatus != 'C' /*非锁定状态*/ AND ISNULL(T0.U_BlackList, 'N') = 'N' /*非黑名单*/ AND ( @DataPur = 'ALL' /*看所有*/ OR T0.OwnerCode = ${UserSign} /*采购员本人*/ OR ISNULL(T2.DeptCode, '') != '' /*可看其他部门的所有供应商 如：海外一组的成员，可以看整个海外组+现货组的所有供应商*/ OR (ISNULL(T3.DeptCode, '') != '' AND ISNULL(T4.GroupCode1, 0) > 0) /*可看其他部门的部分供应商，如海外一组的成员，仅可以看如大中华组的贸易商、库存分销商*/ OR (@DataPur = 'Dept' AND ISNULL(T1.DeptCode, '') != '') /*可看本部分*/ ) AND T0.CardCode = #{CardCode}
